RepeatingProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEntering
RepeatingProperty.Description: Resource releases when a parent entity is entering the object.

EnumProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringResourceType
EnumProperty.Description: The method for specifying the resource object(s) to release.

ObjectInstanceProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringResourceName
ObjectInstanceProperty.Description: The name of the resource object to release.

ListNameProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringResourceListName
ListNameProperty.Description: The name of the object list from which to select the resource object(s) to release.

EnumProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringQuantityType
EnumProperty.Description:
Indicates the type of resource quantity to release.
Specific – Is the exact quantities entered in the Number Of Objects and Units Per Object properties.
All – Is all currently seized resources of the specified resource type.

ExpressionProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringNumberOfResources
ExpressionProperty.Description: The number of individual resource objects to release capacity units of.

ExpressionProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringUnitsPerResource
ExpressionProperty.Description:
The number of capacity units to release per candidate resource.
In the expression, use the syntax Candidate.[ObjectClass].[Attribute] to reference an attribute of the candidate resource objects (e.g., Candidate.Object.Capacity).

EnumProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringReleaseOrder
EnumProperty.Description: The order in which to release the resources that have been seized by the entity.

ExpressionProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringSelectionCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description:
Optional condition evaluated for each seized resource that must be true for the resource to be selected.
In the expression, use the syntax Candidate.[ObjectClass].[Attribute] to reference an attribute of the candidate resource objects (e.g., Candidate.Object.Capacity).

ExpressionProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringKeepReservedCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description:
Optional condition indicating whether to keep the released resource capacity reserved for possible later reuse by the same entity. Other entities will be unable to use a reserved resource unless the reservation is cancelled.
In the expression, use the syntax Candidate.[ObjectClass].[Attribute] to reference an attribute of the candidate resource object(s) being released (e.g., Candidate.Object.Capacity).
Note that when an entity is attempting to select a resource from a group of candidates (e.g., from a list or from a population of some resource type), by default a preference will be given to select a resource that has already been reserved by that owner irrespective of the specified selection goal.
Leaving this property blank (no condition) is equivalent to entering False.

ExpressionProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringReservationTimeout
ExpressionProperty.Description:
If the keep reserved condition is true, then an optional wait time before automatically cancelling the reservation.
In the expression, use the syntax Candidate.[ObjectClass].[Attribute] to reference an attribute of the resource object(s) being released (e.g., Candidate.Object.Capacity).

ElementProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringOnReleasedProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Optional process to be executed when a resource is released.

ExpressionProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringSkipReleaseCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description: Optional condition indicating whether to skip the release requirement.

BooleanProperty.Name: SecondaryResourceReleasesOnParentEnteringImmediatelyTryAllocateWhenReleased
BooleanProperty.Description:
Indicates whether to immediately try allocating the released resource capacity to waiting seize requests before the execution of any other simulation logic in the system.
Setting this property to False will skip immediate allocation. Instead, an evaluation of the resource allocation queues will be scheduled on the simulation’s current event calendar as a late priority event.

ElementProperty.Name: RunInitializedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the simulation run is initialized.

ElementProperty.Name: RunEndingAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the simulation run is ending.

ElementProperty.Name: ParentEnteredAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity has entered the parent input buffer of this Combiner object and is about to start the 'Parent Transfer-In Time'.

ElementProperty.Name: MemberEnteredAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity has entered the member input buffer of this Combiner object and is about to start the 'Member Transfer-In Time'.

ElementProperty.Name: BeforeProcessingAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when a batch's parent entity has been allocated Combiner capacity, but before entering (or ending transfer into) its processing station.

ElementProperty.Name: ProcessingAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when a batch's parent entity has been allocated Combiner capacity, ended transfer into the Combiner's processing station, and is now about to start the processing time.

ElementProperty.Name: AfterProcessingAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when a batch's parent entity has completed the processing time and is about to attempt its exit from the Combiner's processing station.

ElementProperty.Name: ExitedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when a batch's parent entity has exited this Combiner object.

ElementProperty.Name: FailedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when this object has failed.

ElementProperty.Name: RepairedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when a failure is repaired at this object.

ElementProperty.Name: EvaluatingSeizeRequestAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when this Combiner object is evaluating whether to accept or reject a request to seize capacity of the combiner. In the executed decision process, assigning a non-positive value to the executing token's ReturnValue state indicates that the seize request is rejected.

ElementProperty.Name: OnShiftAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the combiner is at the start of a shift because of its specified work schedule.

ElementProperty.Name: OffShiftAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the combiner is at the end of a shift because of its specified work schedule.

ExpressionProperty.Name: CapitalCost
ExpressionProperty.Description: The initial one-time setup cost to add this object to the system.

ExpressionProperty.Name: ParentInputBufferCostPerUse
ExpressionProperty.Description: The cost to hold an entity in this buffer irrespective of the waiting time.

ExpressionProperty.Name: ParentInputBufferHoldingCostRate
ExpressionProperty.Description: The cost per unit time to hold an entity in this buffer.

ExpressionProperty.Name: MemberInputBufferCostPerUse
ExpressionProperty.Description: The cost to hold an entity in this buffer irrespective of the waiting time.

ExpressionProperty.Name: MemberInputBufferHoldingCostRate
ExpressionProperty.Description: The cost per unit time to hold an entity in this buffer.

ExpressionProperty.Name: OutputBufferCostPerUse
ExpressionProperty.Description: The cost to hold an entity in this buffer irrespective of the waiting time.

ExpressionProperty.Name: OutputBufferHoldingCostRate
ExpressionProperty.Description: The cost per unit time to hold an entity in this buffer.

ElementProperty.Name: RepairingAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description:
Occurs when the repair time for a failure at this object is about to begin.
NOTE: This property has been deprecated. Use the 'Add-On Process Triggers -> Failed' property instead.

Override.Name: ResourceIdleCostRate
Override.Description: The cost per unit time that is charged for each unutilized scheduled capacity unit of the combiner.

Override.Name: ResourceCostPerUse
Override.Description: The one-time cost per capacity unit that is charged each time the combiner is used, regardless of the usage duration. Is charged to the cost of the entity that seized the combiner.

Override.Name: ResourceUsageCostRate
Override.Description: The cost per unit time that is charged for each utilized capacity unit of the combiner. Is charged to the cost of the entity that seized the combiner.

Override.Name: CapacityType
Override.Description: The method used to specify the number of batching operations that this Combiner object can simultaneously process.

ListState.Name: ResourceState
ListState.Description:
Gets the current resource state of the object.
Possible Values: Starved = 0, Processing = 1, Blocked = 2, Failed = 3, OffShift = 4, FailedProcessing = 5, OffShiftProcessing = 6, Setup = 7, OffShiftSetup = 8

Event.Name: Failed
Event.Description: The Failed event provides notification that this resource has failed.

Event.Name: Repaired
Event.Description: The Repaired event provides notification that a failure at this resource has been repaired.

Event.Name: FailuresTimerReset
Event.Description: The FailuresTimerReset event provides notification to reset the built-in failure stream timer(s) of this resource.

Element.Name: ParentInputBuffer
Element.Description: The location inside the combiner where parent entities wait to have batch members attached.

Element.Name: MemberInputBuffer
Element.Description: The location inside the combiner where member entities wait to be added to a batch.

Element.Name: Processing
Element.Description: The location inside the combiner where each parent entity is processed after its batch is formed.

Element.Name: OutputBuffer
Element.Description: The location inside the combiner where parent entities wait to exit the object after being processed.

Element.Name: Batching
Element.Description: The Batch Logic element used to executing batching logic at the combiner.

Element.Name: Failure
Element.Description: The failure occurrences for this object.
